thread.title: Pakistan placed on terrorist financing watchlist

title: Pakistan placed on terrorist financing watchlist
text:
Pakistan placed on terrorist financing watchlist 3:13pm GMT - 01:20 
The U.S. successfully lobbies to have Pakistan placed on a terrorist financing watchlist, part of a broader campaign to pressure the country into severing alleged links with Islamist militant groups. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The U.S. successfully lobbies to have Pakistan placed on a terrorist financing watchlist, part of a broader campaign to pressure the country into severing alleged links with Islamist militant groups.
